## Importacao de dados

Primeiramente vamos importar os dados:

Usaremos o banco de dados "Doubs.spe" e "Doubs.env" do pacote ade4 (Verneaux, 1973).

```{r cars}
library(ade4)
data(doubs)
env<-doubs$env
spe<-doubs$species
env[1:5,]
spe[1:5,]

```

## Plotando graficos

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
boxplot(env)
```


## Referencias

Verneaux, J. (1973) Cours d'eau de Franche-Comte (Massif du Jura). Recherches ecologiques sur le reseau hydrographique du Doubs. Essai de biotypologie. These d'etat, Besancon. 1-257.

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
